tweet: 🪙➕ We've added 9 new assets today.  All are immediately available for trading, including instant purchases from your bank account.  · Monero – #XMR · Tron - #TRX · Dogecoin - #DOGE · Filecoin - #FIL · Zcash - #ZEC · Kusama - #KSM · Waves - #WAVES · Icon - #ICX · Nano - #NANO

I have said it before and I'll say it again.  Monero will be one of the most crucial currencies to own in the next few years as it is completely private and untraceable by criminal organizations (govts).  Cake wallet is awesome and you can easily switch between BTC and XMR there!
Going to bridge to private networks because nobody else will.  Also a testament to being censorship-resistant and decentralized.   $XMR $ZEC $XHV

Wondering about the best way to exchange $XMR for $BTC & other crypto? We've got your answers in our new explainer series with @girlgone_crypto.   Check out our YouTube for more #Monero tutorials: ➡️  https://t.co/2zs4eQ6IFA 🔥  https://t.co/aTiy6W8gBc
Monero's all-time high in 2017 was near $500!  It is currently near $150!  This, my friends, is what we call a huge buying opportunity!

Even if you just want BTC, if you bought the BTC on a KYC exchange where they have all your info you should swap it into XMR and then back into BTC.  And then you can say you lost all your BTC in a boating accident and there is no way to prove otherwise! ;)
